title: DataSoft introduces IoT-based toll solution in DRC | The Daily Star
body: Later, M Manjur Mahmud, director and COO of DataSoft , and his team visited DRC to sign the contract. During their visit, the team met Jose Makila Sumanda, vice premier minister of transport and communication channels, and Tenday Luaba, honorary consul of DRC in the UK.

title: DataSoft Systems Bangladesh - Products, Competitors, Financials...

title: Top app development companies video interview: Datasoft | AppFutura
body: M. Manjur Mahmud, Director and COO at DataSoft Systems Bangladesh Limited mobile app development com. Datasoft is a top mobile app development company from Bangladesh . Datasoft has offices in the US, Rotterdam and they'll open an office in May in Osaka, Japan.

title: GTIC x Bangladesh ! | My Eyes Tokyo
body: They had two Bangladeshi as guest speakers. One was M. Manjur Mahmad, who loves Haruki Murakami’s works, writing haiku and drawing pictures that are inspired by Japanese-style painting. Another is Ahmadul Hoq, a serial entrepreneur who used to stay in Japan for the project.

title: DataSoft Bangladesh to create 10,000 smart homes in Tokyo
body: DataSoft Systems Bangladesh will develop concept and provide next generation Internet of Things or IoT solutions for 10,000 smart homes in Tokyo.
